definition: Xinrong district of Datong city 大同市[Da4 tong2 shi4], Shanxi
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Xinrong district of Datong city 大同市[Da4 tong2 shi4], Shanxi

sentences.english: Knowing how greatly interested I am in your progress, allow me to congratulate you on this new honour.
sentences.chinese: 聞足下進步之大，無任允欣，如此新榮，殊堪祝賀。
